name: Home for winter
description:
Welcome to "Home for Winter"

in this game you have to make it to the end of the level along with your backpack and steak.

your backpack is very heavy, and you can't jump with it on. Instead, try to place it down and grab it with a nearby pulley.

Controls:

Right arrow: move right

Left arrow: move left

Up arrow: jump

Right ctrl: pick up your backpack either by your hands or with your rope.

Right shift: stake down your currently held rope to the ground

click on a pulley to connect a rope to it

16:9 monitor resolution recommended

Contributors
